price: Nayo abakurikiye uburongozi, Imana Allah Iraheza Ikabongerereza uburongozi ku bwo bari basanganwe, maze ukwemera kwabo kugakomera; Ikanaborohereza mu kubashoboza gushikira igamburukiramana ryiyongera ku ryo bari basanganwe.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
